Show all posts March 29, 2016 Neuromorphic supercomputer has 16 million neurons brain, ibm, neuromorphic, neurons, neurorobotics, science, technology Facebook Twitter linkedin google Reddit Today, Lawrence Livermore National Lab (LLNL) and IBM announced the development of a new Scale-up Synaptic Supercomputer (NS16e) that highly integrates 16 TrueNorth Chips in a 4Ã—4 array to deliver 16 million neurons and 256 million synapses. LLN
